author: Turner Vink

changelog.release_notes:
Added:
- Urrà! Italian language support

Added:
- Shake to show weather is back!

Changed:
- Bluetooth disconnected indicator shows up regardless of weather mode

Changed:
- Toggle to enable or disable Health is always visible without having to set the middle bar to step goal first
- Settings are saved after they are received on the watch in order to keep data if the watchface isn't closed before switching to a new one

Version 5.0! Another rebuild bringing some new features and optimizing old ones.

New:
- Support for Pebble 2
- Offline configuration with Clay
- Seconds
- Step tracking using the middle bar
- Night mode
- Manual weather location
- Error display for when weather can't be fetched

Changed:
- Bluetooth status is now shown in place of the weather when disconnected
- Weather is just one larger size now

Removed:
- Shake to show weather

If you have any feedback please get in touch through the Pebble App Store!
- Fixed Bluetooth vibration settings not persisting between loads

- Added an option for a larger weather font
(This version was previously released, but introduced an error on Aplite regarding app mesages. This issue has been resolved. Sorry for any inconvenience!)

- Bluetooth vibration settings are now saved when the watchface closes
- Weather should now update on the hour properly

- Added language support for French, Spanish, and German
- Adjusted the position of the weather on Pebble Time Round
- More detailed forcasts

- Support for Pebble Time Round! (If you have any feedback please email me!)
- Option to use a weekday/date/month format instead of weekday/month/date

- New battery bar style! It now shrinks from both ends instead of just one
- Option for static middle bar if always seeing battery level isn't your thing

- Increased font size for the date
- Added a Bluetooth status indicator with optional vibrations

- Fixed weather not fetching. OpenWeatherMap recently started required an API key, which Square was not using
- Weather doesn't update if it's turned off in settings
- Fixed config page URL
- Added option to hide weather all the time
- Switched to openweathermap.org for weather data

- Added background colour option Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel
- Fixed charging status on Pebble and Pebble Steel
- Fixed weather not showing up on first load

- Added launch animation
- Fixed default colours on Basalt

Square has been rebuilt from the ground up!
- Added a nice new config page using Slate
- Don't like green? Pick whatever text colour you want on Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel!
- Wanna change things up? You can now invert colours on Pebble and Pebble Steel!

- Added option to always show weather
- Added charging status
- Used some CSS to make the config page look nicer

description:
Square is a clean looking watchface packed with tons of features!
If you enjoy it, leave a heart and consider donating through the link on the settings page!

- Offline configuration with Clay
- Supports English, French, Spanish, German, and Italian
- Choose any colour for the text and background
- Pick different colors during the night
- Weather information using either GPS or manual location
- See weather all the time, when you flick your wrist, or hide it completely
- Middle bar can be static, show battery level, or progress to your step goal
- Bluetooth dis/connect vibrations and status
- Two date formats, THU APR 2 or THU 2 APR
title: Square
